PCI Settings

Figure 7-18 PCI

Table 7-10 PCI Parameters

Field Name

Description

Max Memory Below 40

The BIOS maximizes memory usage below 4GB for an operating system without PAE support, depending on the system configuration.

Select Disabled, Enabled, or Platform Default.

Memory Mapped IO Above 4Gb Config

Enable or disable memory mapped I/O of 64-bit PCI devices to 4GB or greater address space.

Select Disabled, Enabled, or Platform Default.

VGA Priority

Allows you to set the priority for VGA graphics devices if multiple VGA devices are found in the system.

Select onboard, offboard, onboard-vga-disabled, or Platform Default.
